pages.text: An apparatus that enables aerial jumps by efficiently controlling the Phantom and Hollow Aspects.

pages.title: Operating Mechanism
pages.text: Emits Hollow Aspect from the wearerâ€™s soles to reduce gravity and gain upward acceleration.$(br2)Simultaneously emits Phantom Aspect to neutralize the Hollow Aspect and convert it into particles of light.$(br2)This suppresses spatial distortion to a temporary state and provides a burst of upward acceleration.
